rows.label: tlk70000015_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Hello there, youngsters. Welcome.
Are you looking for any instruments in
particular this fine day?

rows.label: tlk70000015_01_msg0002
rows.name:
For beginners, I'd recommend the
Iiran Viella. You'll be serenading
your friends in no time at all!

rows.label: tlk70000015_01_msg0003
rows.name:
It's not got many strings, so it's simple
to learn. There are also many good
songs for beginners. It's a winner!

rows.label: tlk70000015_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Once you've learned some pieces,
you can join an ensemble! It's a good
way to improve in a hurry.

rows.label: tlk70000015_01_msg0005
rows.name:
We've even got a special event where
people play the Iiran Viella to
express thanks to the Divine Beast.

rows.label: tlk70000015_01_msg0006
rows.name:
It's not an event to be missed!
The music spreads through the air,
so delicate and yet so strong...
